name: Minorama
description:
Take a trip to a mini universe. 

Use your skills to solve puzzles, accomplish missions while
contemplating each unique planet.  

A game made for #BTPGameJam n.2 (Mini Planets).

I'd like to know what you think about the game, please leave a comment/feedback.

Thanks! 

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Controls

DOWN,UP,LEFT,RIGHT or WASD to rotate planet.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Credits

Music 'Touch Tone' & 'You Will Know' from Youtube audio library.
Font 'ShadowsIntoLight' from GoogleFonts.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Tools

Unity, Gimp, Inkscape, MagicaVoxel, Cfxr.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Features

ver. 0.1:
- 2 playable levels.
